name: White Delirium
description:
White Delirium is a Top-Down Bullet Hell Shooter for GMTKjam2020.

Shoot, collect gems to upgrade your weapon and survive as long as you can to get the High score.

There are no real controls. Your character does stuff based on what is under your cursor.

Controlls :

  • There are no real controls
  • Move cursor away from your character to make him follow it
  • Hover your cursor above enemies to shoot at them
  • Hover your cursor above your character to reload
  • ESC to end the game

Tell me your best high score in the comments!

if the resulotion is all funny try alt+enter.

Twitter: @Fiskyfisko
